attributes.description: Bra size, consisting of band and cup. Use this attribute if the garment has both measurements.
Measurement in inches of the band of the bra that fits around the ribcage just under the bust.
Letter size to optimize bra fit, measured at the chest at its widest point.
Features specific to brassieres, including types such as Back-Smoothing, Compression, and Padded.
